conclusion: Understanding the problem setup and what needs to be found.
Description of the wire frame in a magnetic field and its rotation.
Recalling basic principles about induced EMF in a rotating conductor loop.
Finding the instantaneous induced EMF when the loop is rotated through 60 degrees.
Calculation of instantaneous EMF using the formula with given parameters.
Calculation of the induced current using the induced EMF and resistance.
Finding the average induced EMF during the rotation from 0 to 60 degrees.
Calculation of change in magnetic flux from 0 to 60 degrees.
Calculation of time taken for the rotation at constant angular velocity.
